events.message: The insured reported a car collision that occurred last night at an intersection with significant vehicle damage and minor injuries.
The claim has been categorised under auto accident based on the provided details about the vehicle collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to manage the claim and assist the claimant throughout the process.
The insurance company formally acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured timely assistance.
Request sent to claimant to provide police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates for further evaluation.
Claimant submitted the police report, images of the vehicle damage, and multiple repair quotes as requested.
An investigator was assigned to review the documents and assess fault and damage extent in the auto accident.
Investigation concluded with the determination of liability and confirmation of vehicle damages as reported.
A settlement offer was proposed covering the cost of repairs and medical expenses related to the minor injuries.
The claimant provided positive feedback indicating satisfaction with the prompt handling and settlement offer.
The claim was officially approved after agreement on the settlement terms by all involved parties.
Insurance payment was issued to the claimant for the approved settlement amount to cover vehicle repairs.
The claim file has been officially closed following the full payment and claimant agreement to the resolution.
